SELECT C.id commentId, C.body commentBody, C.created_at commentCreatedAt, C.article_id commentArticleId, COUNT(CASE WHEN CR.reaction_type = 'LIKE' THEN 1 END) as likesCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN CR.reaction_type = 'DISLIKE' THEN 1 END) as dislikesCount, MAX(CASE WHEN CR.user_id = #{currentUserId} THEN CR.reaction_type END) as currentUserReaction,
from comments C left join users U on C.user_id = U.id left join comment_reactions CR on C.id = CR.comment_id
mapper.select: where C.id = #{id} GROUP BY C.id, C.body, C.created_at, C.article_id, U.id, U.username, U.bio, U.image
where C.article_id = #{articleId} GROUP BY C.id, C.body, C.created_at, C.article_id, U.id, U.username, U.bio, U.image
